Html:
Dear D3-team,

I appreciate your very nice data representation tool.
I have an request. Is it possible to select certain data points within the line graph manually?
The procedure is as follows:

1. The data are displayed as line diagram
2. The user identifies some outliers
3. The user clicks on the outliers in the line diagram
4. The outliers are displayed as marked
5. The data are displayed as line diagram again (without the outliers)

Is such an option already integrated or does someone knows how to do this?

Cheers
Markus
